custode.title: Code Guardian
custode.securityDescription: Protect your access with a secure recovery system
custode.modifyTooltip: Modify the secret word and birth date associated with your IQCode for future recovery. Data remains anonymous and unrecoverable by our system.
custode.activateTooltip: Code Guardian helps you recover your IQCode if you forget it. Save a secret word and special date now: they will be used securely only by you.
